snippet: Activists filmmakers in Cairo set up a projector outside the presidential palace on Sunday night and showed video shot at the same location last week during deadly street battles.
abstract: Activists filmmakers in Cairo set up a projector outside the presidential palace on Sunday night and showed video shot at the same location last week during deadly street battles.

headline.main: Cairo Filmmakers Screen Images of Revolt on the President's Wall

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
